LanguageData.Cloning_Cooldown_Description: If enabled, extracting a clone embryo causes gene sickness just like extracting or implanting genes normally would.
LanguageData.Cloning_Settings_CooldownDays_Tooltip: Measured in days. 1 Year is 60 days. Default
LanguageData.Cloning_Mutations_Description: If enabled, clones have a random chance of gaining a random (usually negative) gene, representing undesired mutations, up to a maximum number. This is meant to help balance how powerful it is to be able to clone freely.
LanguageData.Cloning_Settings_GeneListHeader: Genes eligible to be added by mutations
